name: Turnip Dungeon
description:
Ever wanted to just sit down, and dungeon crawl the whole night away? Well with Turnip Dungeon you can! The game features endless dungeon generation, along with enemies, and a key/door puzzle to find in each dungeon. 

As of now, only the core game mechanics are in place, but feature to come include:

  • Items Implemented Update 1.2
  • Different enemies
  • Bosses

Made in GameMaker: Studio 2
